channel.title: 2018 04 29 on Zack's Notablog
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 04 29 on Zack's Notablog

item.title: Painters & Hackers
item.description: Hacking1 and painting2 are both hobbies for me. I write programs for myself, to make things easier or just because they are fun to write. Few of these programs are useful3. More often I write useless programs, like a program to determine if random squiggles generate random numbers4. I started painting and coding about fifteen years ago5 for my own enjoyment. Along the way, though I’ve found some interesting comparisons about the reception of paintings and programs and whats it like to interact with other hackers and painters.
